thread.section_title: Theresa May says we will ‘never give in to terror’ as she condemns ‘sick’ attack – Metro

thread.title_full: Theresa May says we will ‘never give in to terror’ as she condemns ‘sick’ attack

author: tmeyjes
title: Theresa May says we will ‘never give in to terror’ as she condemns ‘sick’ attack
text:
Theresa May called the terror attack on Parliament today ‘sick and depraved’ (Picture: BBC) Theresa May called the terror attack on Parliament today ‘sick and depraved’ adding that we will ‘never give in to terror’. 
More to follow.
 
MORE: Schoolchildren sing to cheer up people locked inside Parliament during terror attack 
MORE: How the London terror attack unfolded: Timeline of the Westminster attack 
MORE: London terror attacker was ‘Asian man in his 40s’ in car registered to affluent area
